com.illcode.meterman.impl

Class RoomDelegateAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.illcode.meterman.impl.RoomDelegateAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RoomDelegate

    public class RoomDelegateAdapter
extends Object
implements RoomDelegate
    An empty RoomDelegate implementation that can be subclassed to override specific methods.

      • entered

        public void entered(BaseRoom r,
           Room fromRoom)
        Description copied from interface: RoomDelegate
        Called when the player has entered the room.
        Specified by:
        entered in interface RoomDelegate
        Parameters:
        r - the room for which we're the delegate
        fromRoom - the room (possibly null) from which the player entered
        See Also:
        Room.entered(Room)

      • exiting

        public boolean exiting(BaseRoom r,
              Room toRoom)
        Description copied from interface: RoomDelegate
        Called as the player is exiting the room (but is still there).
        Specified by:
        exiting in interface RoomDelegate
        Parameters:
        r - the room for which we're the delegate
        toRoom - the room the player is attempting to move to.
        Returns:
        true to block the player from exiting, false to allow the exit (note that the exit may fail for other reasons)
        See Also:
        Room.exiting(Room)

        See Also:
